attributes.action: Actually take action as a result of petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the e-petitions system is a green move which will remove the need to dispose of a lot of waste paper, it is also exposing the complete contempt in which the government holds the views of the people. Over 1.5 million people sign a petition, and the PM sends them an e-mail to tell them that they are wrong. Arrogance in the extreme.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
